Header: North Korean leader watches Chinese artistes’ concert in Pyongyang
Content: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un watched a concert by Chinese and North Korean artistes in Pyongyang. In the video aired by North Korean state-run television KRT, Kim was seen being greeted by Chinese artistes and taking group photographs with them at Mansudae Art Theatre. The footage also showed Kim and Chinese delegation including Chinese ambassador to Pyongyang, Li Jinjun, watched a joint concert which was decorated with photographs of leaders of the two countries and friendship messages. Chinese delegation arrived in Pyongyang at the invitation of the North Korean Minister of Culture, according to the North’s official news agency KCNA.
